articles.author: Spencer Kimball
articles.title: Judge extends deadline in lawsuit seeking to pull abortion pill mifepristone from U.S. until Feb. 24 - CNBC
articles.description: The abortion rights group NARAL Pro-Choice America, in an analysis published Friday, said 40 million women could lose access to the abortion pill.
articles.content:
A federal judge in Texas has extended until Feb. 24 the deadline in a lawsuit seeking to overturn the Food and Drug Administration's approval of the abortion pill.

articles.title: US officials say Chinese spy balloon flew over top secret nuclear bases - Euronews
articles.description: The Chinese balloon shot down last week had crossed America on a spy mission, US officials confirm.
articles.content:
Images from U2 spy planes show the Chinese balloon that flew over the United States last week was unmistakably equipped for collecting intelligence and not weather data, an official said Thursday.
